website_summaries.verdict: Great value for money and ideal for the beginner student. This half-size guitar is lightweight and portable without compromising on quality and sound.
pros: An ideal entry level guitar for younger students, or those with smaller hands
Solid basswood construction with laminated spruce top helping to reduce scratches and marks
Ships with a low action strings, which is ideal for beginners, as it reduces fatigue when learning
cons: Takes a while for the strings to settle in and keep tune

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you enough what a wonderful guitar this is! The price is outstanding and comes complete! My grandson LOVES it! He's 8 and is perfect for him! I'm so happy with this purchase! I had a issue with my first purchase and I have to say the customer service is impeccable! Professional and caring! I received a replacement within a few days and just in time for my Grandsons special day! Thanks to the staff you made my buddy smile ear to ear. Had to post some pictures! It was a huge success!
customer_reviews.author: ArtistPSW

customer_reviews.title: This guitar is a joke
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is a joke. You can't tune it properly no matter how much you try. I bought this for my daughter thinking it would be good for her age but it turned out to be a piece of junk. I understand that this is a "beginner" guitar, but really ?!! the buzzing from its body is so annoying that it is impossible to tolerate even for beginners and I don't want my daughter to think that guitar should sound like that
customer_reviews.author: JB&AB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful guitar. This is definitely for kids
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar. This is definitely for kids. My 9 yr old wanted to take lessons. I didn’t want to spend a ton and she wanted a specific color. While searching on Amazon we found this one. It was perfect. Came with everything she needed. The bag is flimsy. I fully expect that to wear out fast. Since the guitar is so cheap expect to have to tune it regularly if not every time you play. I don’t mind. It’s good practice for her. We are very pleased with the guitar. It’s a perfect starter.
customer_reviews.author: Roxaroos

customer_reviews.title: An okay guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Okay starter guitar. Bought this for my little sister so I can teach her (I play classical guitar). Strings definitely needed changing out the box, and guitar does not stay in tune for too long even after new strings have settled, A few frets were coming off the side, and some of the paint on the fingerboard were in noticable blotches. Still, after all was said and done the guitar managed to be playable. In retrospect, dishing out 30-40$ more would get you a better guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I was a tiny bit disappointed after reading the rave reviews to find this guitar isn't exactly what all the reviews claim it to be. It is somewhat cheaply made, and mine only came with the guitar- no accessories at all. I have yet to hear back from the seller about those missing items. The strings are flimsy, too. Not sure where all the rave reviews came from but this guitar is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Bad. A toy. Impossible to keep in tune. Poor quality. No tone. Very poor packaging. Very lightly taped with one loose strip- box was half opened when received. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Third better for to go with a guitar that is too ...
customer_reviews.text: At the guitar shop I had originally purchased a 3/4 size with metal strings for my 11 year old son. Buy this one for 3 reasons. First, nylon strings are easier for a child/beginner as the metal is a bit "sharp" on the fingers. And second, it's so cheaper than any other. Third better for to go with a guitar that is too small than too large .No question these were good calls, he's doing very well with this guitar and I enjoy playing it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ming lee

customer_reviews.title: I'm a guitar teacher, and bought these for students ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guitar teacher, and bought these for students. These guitars are toys. Do NOT expect to be able to keep them in tune, or expect even a beginner to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Saddle Is Too High
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent beginner guitar for the price. Only issue is the saddle is much too high, making the action too high. The saddle is also flat and straight, resulting in too much space between the high strings and the fretboard. My 10-year-old daughter has been super frustrated learning on this high action. I supposed this is what you get for mass-produced budget guitars from the factory. To address this, when I replaced the strings, I sanded the saddle down 2mm on the bass strings and 3mm on the treble strings. Now the action is where it should be, and my daughter is enjoying learning more.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging, never stays in tune
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival, the box was basically torn apart and it appeared as if someone had tried to put it back together. The guitar itself wasn’t even in the package it was supposed to be in and had been bouncing around. Overall, the guitar is ok. Our big problem is the guitar never seems to stay in tune. We tune it day after day and never seem to stay. And this is after having it for 3.5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little learning guitar.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson can't put the guitar down. It is very enjoyable to see a 12 year old be so attached to music! Nice warm sound, keeps tuned very well, good buy for the price. It ain't a Martin. but it's also not junk.
customer_reviews.author: CulinaryGranny

customer_reviews.title: Dont even bother
customer_reviews.text: Not a real instrument!!!! You can go to Walmart and get the same cheap guitar. Won't stay in tune, the bag broke while unzipping the first time. Worth going to a guitar store and spending money to get something nice that will last. I ended up doing that and keeping this for my 4 year old to mess with.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Definitely beginner guitar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son. I played it for hours to get it in tune before I gave it to him and he still could tell right away that the sound quality is not the best. He is a natural musician, so no surprise there. The product is perfect for him to learn and practice until he can move on to a bigger guitar with better sound quality. It would have been nice if the fret was not so high, specially when this is a kid guitar. For the price this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mujer maravilla

customer_reviews.title: Ok instrument for a CHILD beginner
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, as a new player, I did not realize that this guitar is literally for children. It is way too small for an adult, even one with slender fingers. It is a nice instrument and will therefore be gifting it to my 10 year old godson. Wish that the seller had been a bit clearer in the description. The quality is also on the lower side, the strings need tuning frequently even while practicing and the designs are stick on decals. I stress again, this is a great starter instrument for a child, but disappointing for an adult beginner player.
customer_reviews.author: MessengerAngel03

customer_reviews.title: Not good for learning
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this guitar for my granddaughter and unfortunately it doesn't meet learning specs. The turning keys are very cheap and will not allow the guitar to stay in tune. And this is after allowing the strings to stretch a little. The play action is too high for beginners. If you insist on buying this guitar I would suggest you buying some good replacement tuners and some strings. The strings are junk. The sound of the guitar is decent and would sound a lot better with some good quality strings. Its a good toy as is, but with a little help its better but still not good for learning because of the high string action.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Burley

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy, not a real guitar!
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is about the size of a ukulele! This was not stated in the description. It also doesn't look much like the picture. It is made of some kind of plastic and looks like a toy. I bought it in November as a Christmas gift and by the time I was ready to wrap it and discovered how different it was from what I wanted, I could no longer return it so now am stuck with it and had to spend more money to get what I thought I was getting the first time! If you are looking for a toy, this is it. If you are looking for a real guitar, look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Tina R Luca

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheap and like a toy not a guitar a kid can begin with. I bought this so my year old daughter would stop asking to play my guitar. You can't really tune it. It's very cheaply made. She does not like it and still asks to play my guitar. I feel like I just wasted money. It sits under her bed and she never uses it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shylon

customer_reviews.title: It got here in two days!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!! They must have overnighted this because when I ordered it I was bummed my son wouldn’t get it until after Christmas. Shipping said December 28- January 3rd. The guitar was here 2 days later!!! We love everything about this guitar! The size is perfect the quality everything. We are very pleased! I would like to note that there are no bolts to attach a strap to which my husband noticed the minute we pulled it from the box. It’s an easy fix but just be aware. Other than that 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: RDiaz

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar, very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guitar. Sounds great after some minor tuning. Nice weight to it but not to heavy. Feels sturdy and made very well. I would definitely buy this again and recommend it to anyone looking for a nice beginner guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy guitar
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old absolutely loves this guitar. I knew he would. I was looking for a middle of the line guitar that he could use for a while, but wouldn't be heartbreaking if it got smashed. I love the tuner and the included strap, but this does not stay in tune at all, and the decal peeled off within a week.
customer_reviews.author: SG123

customer_reviews.title: Delighted!
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with this little guitar. I bought it for myself. I'm almost 60 and found my left hand's joints don't work as well as they used to. I Can Play This Guitar! I've read a lot about problems with tuning. It comes with very loose strings for travel. It is supposed to! If the box is buzzing... the octave chosen is too low. If they break. Either they are old strings, or the tuner went an octave too high. I got the blue, and it's so damn cute!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's "ok" but missing accessories.
customer_reviews.text: So far my grandson is enjoying his guitar. However, it did not come with the promised strap. I guess I should've paid closer attention to the reviewers who mentioned that they were missing promised accessories. I have only seen pictures of my grandson with the guitar, but my daughter told me me that she didn't hold much hope of it staying tuned. But she said my grandson loves it and for right now that is what matters most.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: It's a toy
customer_reviews.text: It's more of a toy the tuners are weak and slip just slightly to put the notes off by cents but just enough to mess up the tone. The inlays are plain white plastic the bridge is plastic the wood is just painted red and the black lines are paint the fret board is all wood even the frets they are painted gold the strings are crap and I still gave it a chance and I replaced the strings but still the tone is muddy and won't hold the tune it's ok as a tool and decoration
customer_reviews.author: Victor rubio

customer_reviews.title: SCAM Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: This is the most poorly made guitar I have ever purchased. It is constantly out of tune almost as fast as you can tune it. The strings are made of poor quality
customer_reviews.author: David Brenner

customer_reviews.title: nice guitar, good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time guitar player. This is a fine instrument for the money. Easy action, robust sound. The finish is pleasing, it sits comfortably in your arms, & weighs enough to feel solid without being too heavy. Excellent choice for a beginner. I'm enjoying playing it, find myself picking it up often. I recommend, as with all inexpensive instruments, that you replace the strings with fine ones & it will keep you happy a long time.
customer_reviews.author: nlc

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 10 year old! No issues at all, no sharp frets, etc... so glad we got it. Perfect size as I thought of going w/ the 3/4 instead of the 1/2 but this is great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lawter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bridge broke when I was initially trying to tune it. So cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: J F

customer_reviews.title: There are some excellent reviews written of the product that are very realistic
customer_reviews.text: Fair for a beginning guitar. I wish that my grandson was ready for one a little larger so that I could have purchased a higher quality product. It was hard finding something acceptable in this size. There are some excellent reviews written of the product that are very realistic. It is hard to get tuned the first time and needs to be frequently tuned. My granddaughter says this is common for classical guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Nai-Nai

customer_reviews.title: It's o.k.
customer_reviews.text: The guitar bag zipper was broken out of the box and unfortunately at the bottom so it's completely unusable. The guitar is unplayable out of the box, strings are very loose, so if you are not a musician yourself and don't know how to do the strings and tune it for your kid, don't get it. The strings are not steel either.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built, bad sound quality, horrible to tune.
customer_reviews.text: Not very well built, horrible to tune. I was hoping to get something decent to see if my kids would be interested in learning without breaking the bank. Returned and back to searching. Going to a music store might be the best option.
customer_reviews.author: JPB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. Has problems staying tuned over a few days, but that is good, keeps my son learning on how to tune it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bridge (holding strings) popped off in less than 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to tune (via tuning app), my 12 month old had a lot of fun strumming and playing, but 12 hours after I received the guitar, in the middle of the night, the bridge just popped off, unable to hold the tension from the strings. I am returning this and have not yet decided if I want a replacement or will seek other, more quality, brands.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: It's the worst purchase I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. It's the worst purchase I've ever bought. I'm a musician so I know how to tune things, got this for my nephew and after taking about 1/2 hour to tune it, it exploded by itself. With screws out and everything!
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Katie

customer_reviews.title: ~~~ Nice Smaller Guitar ~~~
customer_reviews.text: Great to have this guitar~~~ I also bought a snark tuner and a "guitar hanger" and extra strings~~~ If any of my Grand Kids take a liking to it , I will let them have it and order another~~~ Sincerely Grapa Pedro
customer_reviews.author: Peter Baker

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to some of the reviews when they mentioned that this guitar was like a toy. It is true this guitar is more like a toy for children to make noise with not even music just noise. Not worth buying this product at all. Save your money for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: A guitar I can give my 7 year old daughter and it can actually be played. Legit guitar. Perfect size for her age and I like that it came with a tuner, cleaner cloth, extra set of strings and pics. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Child toy only
customer_reviews.text: 1st one came in a larg box. When i opened it the small box containing the guitar was crushed. Ordered a new one came in good condition. Description says steel strings but only three are steel the rest are plastic! Ive been trying to tune this pos for 3 days now. I'm going to try to replace the strings. Do not buy if your child wants an instrument not a baby toy!
customer_reviews.author: mason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent guitar- the bonuses however were not great- they came damaged/broken.
customer_reviews.text: Bag came with broken zipper and the tuner did not work. Yes, I checked the battery, it was at 100%. The tuner would not turn on it was DOA. I had to purchase another tuner and bag. However, the guitar is truly excellent and the delivery and packaging was fine. The guitar is the main focus so I give this 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Frane413

customer_reviews.title: This guitar is absolutely beautiful! I am an occasional guitar player and own ...
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is absolutely beautiful! I am an occasional guitar player and own a couple full size acoustic guitars. It is light weight and has a great sound for its size. I originally bought this guitar for my 8 year old daughter so that she would have her own to practice on. Now, I can't seem to put it down at times. I ordered a second one a week after this delivery. I am completely satisfied for the quality and price. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Juan  Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This guitar was a bit too large for my 5 year old but in a year or two it will be perfect for his transition from a 1/4 size. This is a great guitar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T

customer_reviews.title: Not an instrument!
customer_reviews.text: This is not an instrument. It is a glorified toy. The whole thing is incredibly cheap. Strings will not stay in tune and the sound box rattles so loudly while trying to play. I got this for my daughter for her 6th birthday and returned it immediately after opening it to see how it was. Seriously don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay tuned for even a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter saved her money to purchase this. It's honestly a piece of junk. 😔 I'm sad that she saved and was excited, only to be so disappointed. She has spent hours upon hours tuning it, only to have it lose it's tune by the time she gets the next string in-tune. It's nice looking, but if you actually want to try to play music with it, invest in something that's better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very basic guitar
customer_reviews.text: This guitar will be fine for a new beginner who is a child. I purchased this guitar for my 8 year old grandson, and the size fits him well. I was disappointed that the guitar did not come with a pick. It would have also been nice if there were basic instructions on playing chords. This guitar cannot have a strap attached. My grandson was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Sz

customer_reviews.title: Toy, not instrument
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun looking guitar, my daughter loves it. She has an incredible imagination. It won't hold a tune to save it's life... Even when it was "tuned" it had an awful quality of sound. All in all, this is a toy that has useless practical use. Don't get it for a beginner musician, get this for a toddler who has an imagination and a good attitude... It will be disappointing for a aspiring child who wants to play a few chords. Paint job would get 3 out of 5 stars if I'm generous.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Rockhill

customer_reviews.title: Cool for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but sound is exactly what I was looking for and I very much like the color of the wood, and details are cool looking, too. Fun little guitar for an adult looking to jam out a little with the sound of a classical guitar. Can sound a bit like a ukelele, too, on the lower plastic strings.
customer_reviews.author: Big D of VA

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: We had to return it because for classes for serious playing it wasn’t working we never get the sound right But for little kids who just play and they’re not learning notes o real sound it may works
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and it sounds very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought the pink one for our daughter for her birthday. My husband plays and is teaching her using this guitar. He played it a few times before we gave it to her and it sounded wonderful. The tuning has to be adjusted often right now but once the strings are played more it should hold it's tune fine. I would definitely recommend and will probably be buying another for my son when he is old enough to start learning. Shipping was fast and the guitar arrived without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for a child.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my granddaughters 7th birthday. She says it is perfect! She was so excited to receive it. She is looking forward to learning to play. She's planning her first concert tour :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie12

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gr daughter who wants to learn to play. My husband plays and is teaching her. Shes a tall 8 yr old and this is perfect size for her and will suffice for years. Sound is good and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: My son has absolutely taken to learning how to play his guitar! Thankfully, he has many loved ones and friends to help him along that path :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCAM. AWFUL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sound. Buzzing body. Strings go out of tune immediately. The strings are loosely WRAPPED AND TIED TO EACH OTHER at the base. Sounds horrible even when in tune for the two minutes it lasts. Toy. Cheap. Even for a seven year old. Box was horribly wrapped, arrived a day late, and was busted open when it arrived. Waste of money. Will collect dust in your child's closet. Cute decoration maybe? Only giving two stars bc it came with all accessories it promised. Which I don't know why I should even give a star for getting what was expected...
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This guitar set was purchased for a 2 1/2 year old who is an adoring fan of Chris Stapleton. He has grown dramatically from using a toy guitar previously. The quality of this guitar and the accessories is top notch. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: EKwine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old daughter. I wanted her to learn playing so I did not want to spend alot. The guitar was ok but the neck and the strings where plastic and would not stay tight. The accessories are cheap and not worth the money. With the issues we had with this item, my daughter lost interest within minutes. A beginner model should be easy to use and well made...this was not!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase for my 6-yr old grandson. It is the perfect size for him and has a surprisingly good resonant sound. I suggest purchasing a “how to” book with the guitar if parents are not musical. Guitars require tuning & some instruction would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a beginner child’s guitar. Get it professionally tuned before use. There are tricks to tuning a new guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Kaier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loved it. The quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: Good call
customer_reviews.text: Prettt decent starter guitar. Bought it for my 5 year old daughter for Xmas. She’s the next Jimmy Hendrix. Prepare yourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Stoda

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 and got this for Christmas. It's the PERFECT size for her and very solidly built! She has no troubles playing it. It was great that it came with a strap, case, pick and tuner as well. Everything you need to get started!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mettenbrink

customer_reviews.title: Beginners only
customer_reviews.text: This is just what you would expect for the price. The finish is uneven and scuffed in some areas. It doesn't hold a tune too well. But for a beginner or a child, who is not sure they will take up guitar for life, it's a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Bag included is useless/
customer_reviews.text: We bought the guitar for our granddaughter for Christmas. The guitar is fine but it came with a bag which is useless. The zipper on the bag has a missing pull so there is no way to zip it. I wrote to Amazon and asked for a replacement bag. All I have gotten from the ADM company is a series of hassles. The do not seem to be willing to replace the defective bag. Do not deal with this unresponsive company.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping my return request gets approved soon. Overall, I'm pleased with the kit. It's a great starter guitar for my 8 year old. Unfortunately, the guitar arrived damaged. I really hope to get this sent back and the new one so he can have it for his next lessons!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Minger

customer_reviews.title: Fairly priced.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size for my 8 year old. It doesn’t stay in tune very well which may have to do with the fact that you load it into the case from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete delivery. Unfulfilled.Stuff promised missingfrom order.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is stating to slip. The accessories describe in the offer were not included in the package. Not acceptable as the accessories were a significant part of my decision to make the purchase. Very disappointing. Kind of like a bait and switch. Not nice and an unfair business practice. Violates CA business code. Please remedy. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my travel guitar, as good as expected considering how cheap it was. Great for little kids I would assume.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little guitar
customer_reviews.text: Nice little guitar. Works well. Sturdy construction and visually appealing. Once the string stretch- with takes a couple of weeks- it will stay decently in tune. My daughter loves it. All the accessories were a very nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L.

customer_reviews.title: Should have waited at least another year-maybe 2
customer_reviews.text: wish I had waited a year or 2. excited to get it but didnt really have the skills for it yet
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay tuned and cannot actually be used to learn because of that. Cheap and crappy
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expected but you get what you pay for. Nylon strings. Flimsy. Poor quality and pretty much useless as far as learning to actually play.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need for a beginner guitarist!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast! It was a gift for a family I was blessing this holiday season, and the girls absolutely loved it!!! I love that the guitar comes with everything a beginner needs to learn to play! Packaged well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dellapelle

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items
customer_reviews.text: All items not in package as described was missing pics and strings and when tried to tune it it broke!
customer_reviews.author: GRUBB

customer_reviews.title: Idea is good, looks good, good price, but cannot get it tuned
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome that they include the tuner and extra strings, but no matter what I did, even after used tuner and each string is tuned, it still sounds horribly out of tune. My daughter used the guitar once and lost interest cause it sounds so bad.
customer_reviews.author: aes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Hard to teach a beginner without fret markers ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Hard to teach a beginner without fret markers to teach with. Now I see why this product was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DON

customer_reviews.title: Unplayable.
customer_reviews.text: Got if for my grandson hoping cheap guitars were better than when I was young, but no such luck. Almost impossible to get in tune let alone keep in tune. Essentially what you pay for is a bunch of wood with cheap strings attached. Makes it impossible for a young person to appreciate music at all.
customer_reviews.author: dan bell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought it for my 6 year old to start learning guitar and is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay in tune, not fretted well, and overall negative experience. Even after allowing Nylon strings to stretch out, this is a piece of crap. Spend another 40 bucks if you know anything about instruments. Nice accessories but you can't put syrup on crap and call it pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar. I don’t know a lot about these sorts of instruments but it still seems sort of big for my 7 year old daughter. But even so she’s able to play it. Just has to work a little harder to get her fingers on the correct position. Great learners guitar.
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds decent but...
customer_reviews.text: Tuning this guitar is a fuss, you tune one string and it affecys the last string you tuned. And they don’t stay tuned, you will be tuning every time you touch it. Not sure what the problem is but, it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah (Mpls, MN.)

customer_reviews.title: So gorgeous, guitar bag came toreeeee up with a ...
customer_reviews.text: So gorgeous, guitar bag came toreeeee up with a broken zipper. Could have been the mail people because the pick, extra strings, and strap were shoved into the top. Other than that my family loves it. We will be buying our daughter one when the time is right.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Overall expected for the price with the exception of the terrible strings. Replace the "strings" for real ones immediately. Was supposed to be a left handed unit.
customer_reviews.author: merlin12volt

customer_reviews.title: Beginner guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Give to my grandson for his 8th birthday. He loves it. Playing around with it almost daily. Right price for a child his age. .
customer_reviews.author: Kathlyn O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great just smaller than I expected. Works great just for little kids. My son is 9 and i would say best for ages 7 & under.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daugbters birthday. So far she loves it. Shes strummed it all day, and squished me with hugs. It is a great starter gaitar.
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: My son loved playing with this
customer_reviews.text: My son loved playing with this. But he dropped it once off the couch and it broke in half. Not really made very strong. Now it’s too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: small guitar
customer_reviews.text: Nice little guitar except it goes out of tune pretty fast the tuning pegs seem a little cheap, might be tuning problem.
customer_reviews.author: Len E. Etter

customer_reviews.title: sound beautifully and nylon string makes me play it much longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Have to tune it everytime I wanted to play in the first week, after that the tune is stable. sound beautifully and nylon string makes me play it much longer than using a steel string guitar.
customer_reviews.author: alex4baby

customer_reviews.title: Two chords wont tune
customer_reviews.text: Cant tune the 4th and 5th chords ... I am sending it back I bought it to have it while on a trip but i cant use it since it wouldnt tune.
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: Changed strings to a much better quality string
customer_reviews.text: Changed strings to a much better quality string, broke it in for days and it sill refuses to hold a tune. Makes it difficult to teach a child how to play when the guitar wont hold a tune for more than a few strokes. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jweeast

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar and bag Material ! I love the tuner and extra strings! My students are very happy x
customer_reviews.author: Carol Schoonhoven; BVI

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for what it was intended to be, bad strings, but thats what I expected. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: One of the more expensive beginner guitars on here but not worth the money. Scratches all over the guitar straight out of the box. I bought the pink one for my daughter but the color doesn’t match up at all. Looks more white with red on the outside than actually pink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came on time and in good shape. It’s a nice looking guitar and right ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the beginner guitar for my daughter. It came on time and in good shape. It’s a nice looking guitar and right for a beginner. I like the fact that everything was included in the set.
customer_reviews.author: MISCHA

customer_reviews.title: Happy costumer!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition and has a great sound. Very cute! A little smaller then expected but very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Santander

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to my 7 year old. It came with everything, even extra strings. He loves it! Too bad the dog chewed up the tuner before we could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kids starter guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. Well made good kids started guitar.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grandson who just is learning to play the guitar. He is doing well with it.
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: fits my 5 year old grand daughter perfect
customer_reviews.text: we loved everything about this product and it will serve my grand daughter well for years. it was bit more then i wanted to spend but so far worth it.
customer_reviews.author: catherine loots

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this, it's a toy, not a real instrument. The strings cannot be tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Psiwolf

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tuning
customer_reviews.text: I likes that size pretty much, but other than that it is not a good starter acoustic guitar, it doesn’t hold the tune.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo T Silva

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller then I thought it would be, the bag had a broken zipper when it came out of the box, kind of sucked when my daughter opened it for Christmas :(
customer_reviews.author: mtmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves it! Great beginner guitar!
customer_reviews.author: Emily DeGuzman

product_meta.title: ADM Beginner Classical Guitar 1/2 size 34 Inch Nylon Strings Wooden Guitar, Sunset
feature_bullets: Trust & quality: Spruce top and basswood back and sides bring you surprisingly rich and bright sound
Elegant stainless button tuners, easy to make the guitar always in tune
3 Nylon strings and 3 steel string protect student's fingers when giving you a sound that's perfect for jazz and classical music
34 Inch half size makes better playability for beginners and students, easy to carry. Perfect for age 6 to 12
Attractive sunset gloss finish and fine carved inlaid brings you a nice visual feeling. Limited lifetime warranty
